Package clickTrainDetector.clickTrainAlgorithms.mht

Class MHTChi2ProviderManager

java.lang.Object
clickTrainDetector.clickTrainAlgorithms.mht.MHTChi2ProviderManager
public class MHTChi2ProviderManager extends Object
Handles which type of chi2 algorithm is being used and what settings pane to create.
Author:
Jamie Macaulay

      public SettingsPane<? extends MHTChi2Params> createMHTChi2Pane()
      Create the chi^2 settings pane. If a new chi^2 algorithm is used then this function will need to change to set new settings pane.
      Returns:
      the chi2 settings pane.
